message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. Given its value and potential, I'm offering it to you for $1,800,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the value this product brings is truly unique. I could meet you halfway between our offers at $1,600,000. This is my best offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
